name: guru-credits
description: GURU Credits - Professional Loan Consultation Services

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build && cd ../admin && npm run build
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace backend && npm run lint --workspace frontend && npm run lint --workspace admin
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace backend && npm run test --workspace frontend && npm run test --workspace admin
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.db:push: cd backend && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
